sentences: Melinda Ann Gates DBE (ne French; born August 15, 1964) is an American philanthropist and a former general manager at Microsoft.

sentences: Melinda Ann French was born on August 15, 1964 in Dallas, Texas.
These included Cinemania, Encarta, Publisher, Microsoft Bob, Money and Word.
In 1994, Melinda married Gates in a private ceremony held in Lanai, Hawaii.
In 2007, Gates received an honorary doctorate in medicine from the Karolinska Institute in Stockholm, Sweden.
